Libra Checker
About

About

Libra Checker is a Libra cryptocurrency block explorer. It is a web application that allows the user to easily explore the blockchain ledger - read data about accounts, addresses and transactions.



To check address balance and transactions:
  • Enter the address in Libra Checker's search field.
  • Use a direct link (https://librachecker.com/address/address_to_check) as in this example:
    https://librachecker.com/address/504c202566b97069c68f96faa1dd24a73d6c3b9b58deda2ce77d35c10960351d


To check transation details:
  • Enter transaction's ID (e.g. 156684) in Libra Checker's search field.
  • Use a direct link (https://librachecker.com/transaction/transaction_to_check) as in this example:
    https://librachecker.com/transaction/83315




Besides Google Analytics with IP anonymization, we do not use any trackers or cookies. We do not collect any personal information about the website users.


Curious how Libra Checker was created? See this tutorial.


Follow and fork Libra Checker on Twitter and GitHub.
